attributes.action: Allow babies born under 24 weeks gestation to be registered
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I had my little boy at 22 weeks and although he was slightly red he was the perfect most gorgeous baby in the world! i was in labour with him for over 12 hours and then had to give birth to him he was born asleep! i want the opportunity to register him and acknowledge the fact that he lived!
